attributes.action: REMOVE ALL EMPLOYMENT AGENCY JOBS FROM THE JOBCENTRE PLUS SITE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most so called job vacancies on the government jobcentre plus site are in fact agency work. If people wanted to work for agency's doing a few weeks here and there then they would contact an agency.THIS WOULD CUT DOWN THE CARBON FOOTPRINT OF THOSE PEOPLE LOOKING FOR FULL TIME EMPLOYMENT AS THEY WOULDN'T BE SPENDING HOURS LOOKING AT THE VACANCIES OFFERED AND THEN FINDING THEY ARE FOR EMPLOYMENT AGENCYS ( FREE ADVERTS IN REALITY)

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
